title: ColdFusion version 8
extract: Adobe ColdFusion is a commercial rapid web application development platform created by J. J. ... (The programming language used with that platform is also commonly called ColdFusion, though is more accurately known as CFML.) ColdFusion was originally designed to make it easier to connect simple HTML pages to a database.
extract_html: Adobe ColdFusion is a commercial rapid web application development platform created by J. J. ... (The programming language used with that platform is also commonly called ColdFusion, though is more accurately known as CFML.) ColdFusion was originally designed to make it easier to connect simple HTML pages to a database.
